name: Go Cockroach go!
description:
Help Forest, a little cockroach escape from a pest control while hiding dangerous items and collecting items. But watch out, time is short and gas can kill you!

Controls:

Keyboard: "WASD" or arrows to move, "SPACE" to boost, "P" to pause.

XBOX control: Analog to move, "A" to boost, "Start" to pause.

Please hate us in Ludundare 46: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/$191805
